title: LF Duo Partner
body:
LF ADC Partner. I'm Support Main.
Gold 3 Pre-season, currently Silver 4.

What I want in duo partner:
- At least 20+ years old. Prefer older players.
- Working headset/mic for communication.
- Positive mindset in any situation.
- Never surrender/give up attitude.
- Open to building friendship to strengthen duo!
- Try new comps/ideas even if it sounds ridiculous!
- Not take things personally.
- Can chat, banter, shit talk, have fun, etc!

IGN: Chopnblok

replies.body: im down man, add me themadbagginjew we can run some games and see how it goes :)

Add me bro, sounds like the kinda guy I'd like to play with, I'm 22 :). I'd like to say my adc isn't bad and I definately have a tryhard attitude when it comes to ranked. I take losses hard but i'm logical about it, no more selling myself, you need to add me and see for urself lol. here's my mains too{{champion:202}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:145}}
Well i meet all of those standards and im down to play but im only 15 feelsbadman
